title: Every Word
description: Sparks fly when Watts follows Mycroft to London in this second steamy thriller about the teen crime-fighting duo.James Mycroft has just left for London to investigate a car accident similar to the one that killed his parents without saying good-bye to his partner in crime, Rachel Watts.Rachel is furious and worried about his strange behavior—not that Mycroft’s ever exactly normal, but London is the scene of so many of his nightmares. Unable to resist, Rachel jumps on a plane to follow him and lands straight in a whole storm of trouble.The theft of a copy of Shakespeare’s First Folio, the possible murder of a rare books conservator and the deaths of Mycroft's parents…Can Watts help Mycroft make sense of the three events—or will she lose him forever?
author: Ellie Marney
